TopicTitle: Classic Photo of the one of the first Kerbals in Space

Articles.Content:
Jebediah Kerman during one of the first spacewalks in Kerbal history!

I decided to make this photo because i just got bored and i saw a recent post by Metalmouth7 (his photos are ten times better than mine).

Just simple stuff on Gimp nothing complicated.

Edited August 27, 2013 by Capn
That's great, but who took the picture?
A Ghost, the ghost of yesterday and today.

The three spirits of Christmas.

What filter (I assume you used one) did you use? I'm trying to learn some image editing with Gimp, but it's turned out to be a slow and tedious process. I've slowly made my way into cropping and resizing, but that's as far as my editing skillz go.

To be honest i am still an amateur with this stuff but it's not hard to notice, I use Gimp on my photos and yes it is tedious to tweak these things until you find the right photo but just mess with it and dont be afraid to mess up there is always the sweet button Control-Z.

Oh and i used multiple filters such as the Blur, enhance and noise.

Edited August 24, 2013 by Capn
oh that is a nice pic... just try hard next time. ^^
